gw.api.startable

Interface StartablePluginCallbackHandler


  • public interface StartablePluginCallbackHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(GWRunnable block)
      Execute a block of code as the super user (su).
      void execute(GWRunnable block, java.lang.String username)
      Execute a block of code as the user identified by the given username.
      void execute(GWRunnable block, User user)
      Execute a block of code as the given user.
      StartablePluginState getState()
      get the plugin's persisted state
      StartablePluginState getState(StartablePluginState defaultState)
      get the plugin's persisted state
      void log(java.lang.String message)
      Writes a message to the logs under the category PLUGIN at the INFO level
      void logStart(java.lang.String name)
      Logs the start of the plugin under the category PLUGIN at the INFO level
      void logStop(java.lang.String name)
      Logs the stop of the plugin under the category PLUGIN at the INFO level

      set the persisted state for this plugin

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        StartablePluginState getState()
        get the plugin's persisted state
        Returns:
        persisted state or stopped

      • getState

        StartablePluginState getState(StartablePluginState defaultState)
        get the plugin's persisted state
        Parameters:
        defaultState - the state to return if not persisted
        Returns:
        persisted state or the default state

      • setState

        void setState(Bundle bundle,
            StartablePluginState state)
        set the persisted state for this plugin
        Parameters:
        bundle - this is a database update so a bundle is required
        state - the new persisted state

      • execute

        void execute(GWRunnable block)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute a block of code as the super user (su). Any beans created or modified within the block of code will be committed when the transaction completes.
        Parameters:
        block - Block of code to execute
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exceptions thrown by the block of code will be re-thrown

      • execute

        void execute(GWRunnable block,
           User user)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute a block of code as the given user. Any beans created or modified within the block of code will be committed when the transaction completes.
        Parameters:
        block - Block of code to execute
        user - The user as whom we want to execute the block
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exceptions thrown by the block of code will be re-thrown

      • execute

        void execute(GWRunnable block,
           java.lang.String username)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute a block of code as the user identified by the given username. Any beans created or modified within the block of code will be committed when the transaction completes.
        Parameters:
        block - Block of code to execute
        username - The username of the user as whom we want to execute the block
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exceptions thrown by the block of code will be re-thrown

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String message)
        Writes a message to the logs under the category PLUGIN at the INFO level
        Parameters:
        message - The message to log

      • logStart

        void logStart(java.lang.String name)
        Logs the start of the plugin under the category PLUGIN at the INFO level
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the plugin

      • logStop

        void logStop(java.lang.String name)
        Logs the stop of the plugin under the category PLUGIN at the INFO level
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the plugin
